Posts.Content: I had breast cancer Stage 1 and had surgery and then received chemo and radiation. Now my oncologist wants to put me on "Tamoxifin", for 5 years. I read about this drug and it has been known to produce cervical cancers. I am scared and wondered if anyone else has taken Tamoxifin ? Are there any side effects? What happens afterwards? Will we ever stop taking medicines or do we have to take medicines for the rest of our lives?
Posts.Title: Has Anybody Taken Tamoxifin?

Posts.Content: My doctor has just given me some pills named "Arimidex", and I wonder if anyone is taking this pill and what side effects if any have you felt? I was told that the side effects are minimal and this is a new drug that is very effective in preventing breast cancer to re-occur in post menoposal women who are positive receptor.
Posts.Title: Has Anybody Taken Arimidex?
